<!-- google webfont font replacement -->

			<script type='text/javascript'>

				(function() {

					/*	check if webfonts are disabled by user setting via cookie - or user must opt in.	*/
					var html = document.getElementsByTagName('html')[0];
					var cookie_check = html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-needs-opt-in') >= 0 || html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-can-opt-out') >= 0;
					var allow_continue = true;
					var silent_accept_cookie = html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-user-silent-accept') >= 0;

					if( cookie_check && ! silent_accept_cookie )
					{
						if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaCookieConsent/) || html.className.indexOf('av-cookies-session-refused') >= 0 )
						{
							allow_continue = false;
						}
						else
						{
							if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyRefuseCookiesHideBar/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
							else if( ! document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyEssentialCookiesEnabled/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
							else if( document.cookie.match(/aviaPrivacyGoogleWebfontsDisabled/) )
							{
								allow_continue = false;
							}
						}
					}

					if( allow_continue )
					{
						var f = document.createElement('link');

						f.type 	= 'text/css';
						f.rel 	= 'stylesheet';
						f.href 	= 'https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Montserrat&display=auto';
						f.id 	= 'avia-google-webfont';

						document.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(f);
					}
				})();

			</script>

!important;}.has-x-large-font-size{font-size: var(--wp--preset--font-size--x-large) !important;}.has-inter-font-family{font-family: var(--wp--preset--font-family--inter) !important;}.has-cardo-font-family{font-family: var(--wp--preset--font-family--cardo) !important;}
:where(.wp-block-post-template.is-layout-flex){gap: 1.25em;}:where(.wp-block-post-template.is-layout-grid){gap: 1.25em;}
:where(.wp-block-columns.is-layout-flex){gap: 2em;}:where(.wp-block-columns.is-layout-grid){gap: 2em;}
:root :where(.wp-block-pullquote){font-size: 1.5em;line-height: 1.6;}
</style>

		@font-face {font-family: 'entypo-fontello'; font-weight: normal; font-style: normal; font-display: auto;
		src: url('https://theotherbordeaux.com/wp-content/themes/enfold/config-templatebuilder/avia-template-builder/assets/fonts/entypo-fontello.woff2') format('woff2'),
		url('https://theotherbordeaux.com/wp-content/themes/enfold/config-templatebuilder/avia-template-builder/assets/fonts/entypo-fontello.woff') format('woff'),
		url('https://theotherbordeaux.com/wp-content/themes/enfold/config-templatebuilder/avia-template-builder/assets/fonts/entypo-fontello.ttf') format('truetype'),
		url('https://theotherbordeaux.com/wp-content/themes/enfold/config-templatebuilder/avia-template-builder/assets/fonts/entypo-fontello.svg#entypo-fontello') format('svg'),
		url('https://theotherbordeaux.com/wp-content/themes/enfold/config-templatebuilder/avia-template-builder/assets/fonts/entypo-fontello.eot'),
		url('https://theotherbordeaux.com/wp-content/themes/enfold/config-templatebuilder/avia-template-builder/assets/fonts/entypo-fontello.eot?#iefix') format('embedded-opentype');
		} #top .avia-font-entypo-fontello, body .avia-font-entypo-fontello, html body [data-av_iconfont='entypo-fontello']:before{ font-family: 'entypo-fontello'; }
		</style>

	<div id='main' class='all_colors' data-scroll-offset='180'>

	
	<div class='stretch_full container_wrap alternate_color dark_bg_color title_container'><div class='container'><strong class='main-title entry-title '><a href='https://theotherbordeaux.com/shop/' rel='bookmark' title='Permanent Link: Shop'  itemprop="headline" >Shop</a></strong></div></div><div class='container_wrap container_wrap_first main_color sidebar_right template-shop shop_columns_3'><div class="container">
					
			<div class="woocommerce-notices-wrapper"></div><div id="product-15178" class="product type-product post-15178 status-publish first outofstock product_cat-uncategorised has-post-thumbnail shipping-taxable purchasable product-type-simple">

	<div class=" single-product-main-image alpha"><div class="woocommerce-product-gallery woocommerce-product-gallery--with-images woocommerce-product-gallery--columns-4 images" data-columns="4" style="opacity: 0; transition: opacity .25s ease-in-out;">
	<div class="woocommerce-product-gallery__wrapper">
		<a href="https://theotherbordeaux.com/wp-content/uploads/haut-boutisse-up.png" data-srcset="https://theotherbordeaux.com/wp-content/uploads/haut-boutisse-up.png 254w, https://theotherbordeaux.com/wp-content/uploads/haut-boutisse-up-79x300.png 79w, https://theotherbordeaux.com/wp-content/uploads/haut-boutisse-up-58x220.png 58w" data-sizes="(max-width: 254px) 100vw, 254px" class='' title='' rel='prettyPhoto[product-gallery]'><img width="254" height="960" src="https://theotherbordeaux.com/wp-content/uploads/haut-boutisse-up.png" class="attachment-shop_single size-shop_single" alt="" decoding="async" srcset="https://theotherbordeaux.com/wp-content/uploads/haut-boutisse-up.png 254w, https://theotherbordeaux.com/wp-content/uploads/haut-boutisse-up-79x300.png 79w, https://theotherbordeaux.com/wp-content/uploads/haut-boutisse-up-58x220.png 58w" sizes="(max-width: 254px) 100vw, 254px" /></a><div class="thumbnails"></div>	</div>
</div>
<aside class='sidebar sidebar_sidebar_right  smartphones_sidebar_active alpha units' aria-label="Sidebar"  role="complementary" itemscope="itemscope" itemtype="https://schema.org/WPSideBar" ><div class="inner_sidebar extralight-border"></div></aside></div><div class="single-product-summary">
	<div class="summary entry-summary">
		<h1 class="product_title entry-title">Château Haut Boutisse red 2022 from Bordeaux</h1><p class="price"><span class="woocommerce-Price-amount amount"><bdi><span class="woocommerce-Price-currencySymbol">&#36;</span>29.95</bdi></span></p>
<p class="stock out-of-stock">Out of stock</p>
<div class="product_meta">

	
	
	<span class="posted_in">Category: <a href="https://theotherbordeaux.com/product-category/uncategorised/" rel="tag">Uncategorised</a></span>
	
	
</div>
	</div>

	
	<div class="woocommerce-tabs wc-tabs-wrapper">
		<ul class="tabs wc-tabs" role="tablist">
							<li class="description_tab" id="tab-title-description" role="tab" aria-controls="tab-description">
					<a href="#tab-description">
						Description					</a>
				</li>
					</ul>
					<div class="woocommerce-Tabs-panel woocommerce-Tabs-panel--description panel entry-content wc-tab" id="tab-description" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="tab-title-description">
				
	<h2>Description</h2>

<p style="text-align: center;"><span style="font-size: 18pt;"><strong><u>Château Haut-Boutisse RED 2022, Bordeaux. NEW VINTAGE.</u></strong></span><br />
<span style="font-size: 18pt;">60% Cabernet Franc and balance is Merlot. Made by Saint-Émilion Grand Cru producer Château Palais Cardinal.</span><br />
<span style="font-size: 18pt;">Dark berry fruit, cassis and blackberry, halo of smoky oak notes, while the palate is softly structured and highly elegant thanks to its high proportion of Cabernet Franc. </span><span style="font-size: 18pt;">Looks the business and delivers. Classic Right Bank claret. </span><br />
<span style="font-size: 18pt;">Drink now to 2027</span></p>
			</div>
		
			</div>

</div></div></div></div><div id="av_section_1" class="avia-section alternate_color avia-section-small  container_wrap fullsize"><div class="container"><div class="template-page content  twelve alpha units"><div class='product_column product_column_4'>
	<section class="related products">

<script>
jQuery(document).ready(function($){
$('textarea#order_comments').attr('placeholder','PUT YOUR DELIVERY INSTRUCTIONS HERE');
});
</script>
<script>
	jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {
    // When the user enters data into the order notes field.
    $('textarea#order_comments').on('input', function () {
        var currentValue = $(this).val();
        // Replace commas with an empty string.
        var newValue = currentValue.replace(/,/g, '');
        $(this).val(newValue);
    });
});
	
jQuery(document).ready(function ($) {
    // When the user presses a key in the order notes field.
    $('textarea#order_comments').on('keydown', function (e) {
        // Check if the pressed key is the Enter key (key code 13).
        if (e.keyCode === 13) {
            // Prevent the default behavior of the Enter key (creating a new line).
            e.preventDefault();
            // Optionally, you can show an error message to inform the user.
            // For example: alert('New lines are not allowed in the order notes.');
        }
    });
});

</script><div id="pum-18561" role="dialog" aria-modal="false" aria-labelledby=&quot;pum_popup_title_18561&quot; class="pum pum-overlay pum-theme-10936 pum-theme-default-theme popmake-overlay auto_open
